title: Your Giant Car Payment Isn’t Impressing Anybody (Hour 1)
description:
George Kamel & Ken Coleman discuss:

How to get your credit score to go to zero,

If and when you need a prenup,

Getting control of debt,

Why you shouldn't brag about your huge car payment (TikTok reaction),

Selling a car vs. paying it off.


Support Our Sponsor:

Churchill Mortgage

PODS Moving & Storage

Splash Financial


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
